Generate a path to navigate from the initial location to the goal location similarly to the examples below. (0,0) is located in the upper-left corner and (M, N) lies in the M row and N column.
  2 denotes the starting location, 3 denotes the goal location, while 1's denotes obstacles.
###
Grid representation:
1110111111111111111111111
1000000000000000000000001
1011101111111111111111101
1010000000000000000000101
1010110111111111111110101
1010100000000000000010101
1010101111011111111010101
1010101000000000001010101
1010101010111111101010101
1010101010000000101010101
1010101010111110101010101
1010101010100010101010101
1010101010101010101010101
1010101010100010101010101
1010101010111110101010101
1310101010000000101010101
1010101011111111101010101
1010101000000000001010101
1010101111111111111010101
1010100000000000000010101
1210111111111111111110101
1010000000000000000000101
1011111111111111111111101
1000000000000000000000001
1111111111111111111111111

Solution: up up up up up
